text.div:
Specimen Role

Code Description Comment Version
b Blind Sample added v2.4
c Calibrator, used for initial setting of calibration added v2.4
e Electronic QC, used with manufactured reference providing signals that simulate QC results added v2.5
f Specimen used for testing proficiency of the organization performing the testing (Filler) added v2.5
g Group (where a specimen consists of multiple individual elements that are not individually identified) added v2.5
l Pool (aliquots of individual specimens combined to form a single specimen representing all of the components.) added v2.5
o Specimen used for testing Operator Proficiency added v2.5
p Patient (default if blank component value) added v2.4
q Control specimen added v2.4
r Replicate (of patient sample as a control) added v2.4
v Verifying Calibrator, used for periodic calibration checks added v2.5

name: v2 Specimen Role
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0369 ( Specimen Role)

concept.display: Calibrator, used for initial setting of calibration
Electronic QC, used with manufactured reference providing signals that simulate QC results
Specimen used for testing proficiency of the organization performing the testing (Filler)
Group (where a specimen consists of multiple individual elements that are not individually identified)
Pool (aliquots of individual specimens combined to form a single specimen representing all of the components.)
Specimen used for testing Operator Proficiency
Replicate (of patient sample as a control)
Verifying Calibrator, used for periodic calibration checks
